tremble.translation[0].definitions[0].de: to shake slightly in a way that you cannot control, especially because you are upset or frightened
tremble.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: His lip started to tremble and then he started to cry.
Greene was on his feet now, his body trembling with rage.
tremble.translation[0].definitions[1].ex: The whole house trembled as the train went by.
tremble.translation[0].definitions[2].de: if your voice trembles, it sounds nervous and unsteady
tremble.translation[0].definitions[3].de: to be worried or frightened about something
tremble.translation[0].definitions[3].ex: I tremble to think what will happen when she finds out.
